SEARCH
Package com.peaslimited.shoppeas.repository.implementation

Class TransactionsRepositoryImpl

java.lang.Object
com.peaslimited.shoppeas.repository.implementation.TransactionsRepositoryImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
TransactionsRepository
@Repository public class TransactionsRepositoryImpl extends Object implements TransactionsRepository
Implementation of TransactionRepository for managing transaction data in Firestore, including methods to retrieve, add, update, and delete transactions.

    • findCartTransaction

      public Transactions findCartTransaction(String uid, String uen) throws ExecutionException, InterruptedException
      Finds a cart transaction based on the user's UID and the wholesaler's UEN. Finds a cart transaction for the specified user (UID) and wholesaler (UEN) with status "IN-CART".
      Specified by:
      findCartTransaction in interface TransactionsRepository
      Parameters:
      uid - the user's unique identifier
      uen - the wholesaler's unique entity number

    • updateTransactionPrice

      public void updateTransactionPrice(String tid, double updatedPrice)
      Updates the price of a transaction based on its transaction ID (TID). Updates the price of a transaction by setting a new value for "converted_price" in Firestore.
      Specified by:
      updateTransactionPrice in interface TransactionsRepository

      tid - the unique transaction ID
